code: import api from"../../services/api";const useContactLists=()=>{const save=async data=>{const{data:responseData}=await api.request({url:"/contact-lists",method:"POST",data});return responseData;};const update=async data=>{const{data:responseData}=await api.request({url:"/contact-lists/".concat(data.id),method:"PUT",data});return responseData;};const deleteRecord=async id=>{const{data}=await api.request({url:"/contact-lists/".concat(id),method:"DELETE"});return data;};const findById=async id=>{const{data}=await api.request({url:"/contact-lists/".concat(id),method:"GET"});return data;};const list=async params=>{const{data}=await api.request({url:"/contact-lists/list",method:"GET",params});return data;};return{findById,save,update,deleteRecord,list};};export default useContactLists;
